Excellent experience for all ages! . We went on the 5 days garden route tour as a family (30+ and 60+) and enjoyed the tour with our guide Gerhard to the maximum. I already did the 3 days garden route before and decided to do it again with my parents and brother as it was so much fun and interesting. You get to know the taste of South Africa and see the main attractions along the garden route. Gerhard was a perfect guide! Everything was planned ahead and we had no waiting times but without feeling in a rush. The small group size makes it easy to get in touch with the other travellers and have a great time together.I'll definitely come back! Thank you Hotspots team

An amazing experience we will never forget - thank you Isaac!. My husband and I started out on this tour not really sure of what to expect, but it was really great. Our guide Isaac was fantastic. Adjectives that I would use to describe him are - very knowledgeable, kind, professional, funny, intelligent, prompt, patient, excellent driver, experienced and a 100% amazing person. We enjoyed everything so much. The accommodations were perfect, the activities were a lot of fun and the group was really nice. I even got to symbolically "adopt" a cheetah, which is something I will cherish forever. The only thing I had an issue with was the ostrich farm, which I perceived as a cruel and unhappy environment for the birds. This one part just made me sad. Perhaps you may wish to consider another site to visit during this tour. It seemed to me that many folks in our group were saddened by the conditions of the birds as most have huge bald spots where they had ripped out their own feathers due to boredom and frustration - information which the ostrich farm tour guide volunteered himself. Even if they are farm animals they do deserve much more respect in my opinion. I left quite angry and it took a while to calm down. We were really not the only ones who felt this way. But besides this everything else was absolutely wonderful. A big thank you to Isaac, especially for sharing your stories with us and for taking such good care of our group. We will definitely be back for another tour soon. Thank you Hotspots.

4 day 3 night Garden Route tour. Our guide Maudy was fantastic, he really tried to make the trip about what we wanted. He tried to do as much with us as possible. The tour was great and encapsulated what we wanted to see from the Garden Route.The only let down was the accommodation, it was not quite up to scratch for what we had paid. It was not clear on booking that if we chose guesthouse accommodation that we would be seperate from the majority of the group who were staying in shared accommodation. This meant the tour guide had to drive us to and from our accommodation to be with the group for the evening and meals, which was sometimes miles out the way (not fair on them when they have been driving all day and need to rest and we want to socialise). We were happy to stay with the group we would have just preferred a private room and bathroom, which wasn't an option on booking. The guesthouse accommodation (which we just thought would be a private room on booking) was satisfactory but not worth what we paid and this let us down. The tour and guide were fantastic, just the accommodation that was the problem.
7 day garden and wine combi. Excellent. Thoroughly enjoyed it and had the most amazing guide (Isaac). Highly recommend doing a tour.

An excellent couple of days!. Thanks to the whole Hotspots2c team! Our guide, Ulrich, was fantastic and couldn't do enough for us all. A true gentleman who did Hotspots2c proud. I also know that there is a team behind a great trip so Thanks to everyone.I'd be happy to recommend this trip based on the service. We didn't travel from more than a couple of hours without a stop and all were worth it.

SOmething not to miss. You have to go to Stellenbosch when you are in Cape Town. This is the premiere winelands in this region. We went to three different wineries and we started with the best first, Ernie Ells. What a spectacular piece of property and the wines were delicious. The person assisting with the tasting had such a passion for the wines that it showed in every description he gave. We also stopped at two other wineries. One paired their wines with sorbets and the other with dried/cured meats. A whole day event but the time goes quickly. Even the drive from Cape Town was interesting since our driver Gerhard was quite knowledgeable and shared lots of tidbit and fun facts about the regions. He was easy going and laid back and never made us feel rushed throughout the entire day!

3 days garden route + safari . Went on a 3 days garden route + Safari in the mid August. I am in love with the western cape... So much to see, every sight is wonderful. I did backward bungee, pet some cheetah cubs, and had lots of fun during all the activities in this tour (elephants, lions, canoeing...). I stayed in the backpackers at night and it was awesome!! braai every night, really good mood and great evening/ nights there with stunning sunrise and sunset (shoutout to the beach @afrovibe backpacker in Sedgefield) Special review for my tour guide Zaahid aka Z very patient and always ready to share his knowledge about history, places and funny stories ! I really enjoyed the drive in his bus, he is an excellent driver, and he was always ok to stop and take pictures from spectacular hot spots with amazing views ! Some crazy selfies and panoramic pics will stay forever haha ! He is lots of fun, nice, always ready to help and willing to make you enjoy your trip!! It was not my first time with hotspots2c but I still highly recommend the tours ! Thanks for the fun time xxx greetings from Paris !

2 day western cape safari - Cape Town. Well what can I say - this tour was the best thing I have ever done. I visited South Africa for five days with work and decided to spend the three nights i had to myself in Cape Town. First of all - the most amazing city I have ever visited !I was picked up on time and after picking up the other people, we set off along the beautifully scenic garden route stopping off to do a 4x4 safari for a couple of hours and then do a lion walk. The lion walk was the highlight of the tour. Walking with the kings of the jungle is just something I will never forget. An overnight stop in Oudtshoorn (pronounced 'oates-urgh-in') in a comfortable family run b&b was done then the ostrich farm, elephant ride (amazing also) and then the wildlife ranch followed before arriving back at my hotel for 6.30pm.Everything mentioned in the itinary was done and for the price, is something i would recommend to everyone. Truly unforgettable and a great way to see the sights outside of the city; which are breath taking.Finally, a special mention to the tour guide Andrew. A top bloke who made sure everyone was ok. Didn't intervene and allowed people to get on with what they wanted to do. I was on my own and he made me feel very welcome. Deserved the big tip I gave him. If you read this mate, again, it was awesome to meet you.

3 Day Private Garden Tour. We had an awesome time visiting so many wonderful attractions including Oudtshoorn - ostrich farm, Cango Wildlife Ranch, the elephant experience and stay at Buffelsdrift Game Lodge and the luxury tent accommodations. We also had a blast at the bungee jump, canoe and stay in Wilderness right on the Indian Ocean. The last day was topped off with a great experience on the Lion Walk and Big 5 Game Drive. Last but not least, our tour guide, Zaahid Sylvester, was the best ever. He gets 5 stars!

Namibia Adventure Tour - UCT Spring Break 2015. This trip was amazing - definitely one of my favorite weeks spent in South Africa! We spent a majority of the time in the Kalahari desert and along the Orange River. We drove through some amazing scenery, saw some very cool animals and definitely had some once-in-a-lifetime experiences. Our guide was great too!!! I would suggest this to anyone.
Four Day Garden Route. Most amazing experience I've ever had. Such a great deal for what it is! Looking forward to doing it again.

Cape Peninsula Day 1 of the 3 Day Western Cape.. A wonderful way to spend a day driving around the peninsula coast, with plenty of stops for photos, shopping, refreshments, and fun activities. I loved seeing seals from a boat in beautiful Hout Bay and feeding the charming ostriches near Cape Point. Zaahid, our guide, was marvellous, a good driver, very knowledgeable, great fun, and a real gentleman. Spectacular views were enjoyed from the spotless, comfortable touring van. Although I live in and know the area, I could relax and drink in the exceptional natural beauty of our unique fauna and flora, which changes in every season and weather.

Orientation Tour in Cape Town & West Coast Wild & Western Cape Wow & 5 days Garden Route. Every single tour of the four I did was a great experience. Very very nice tour guides (we had a lot of fun with all of them), everything was organised well and an awesome route with breathtaking views over the coast. Nice photo points and well selected hostels.You need a good camera and much memory on it! ;)

3 day adventure . Went on the 3 day garden route tour in late July/early August 2015.I had Andrew as my guide who was an excellent driver & very informative on the towns & places we went past & went too visit.I was lucky enough to have the front seat of the van.Went with a full bus of young adults who made it a well worthy trip too!.I managed to do all the available activities that they had to offer(even the optional activities) which was elephant riding,bungee jumping & walking with the lions.Also I stayed at the guest houses not the dorms that's if you like you're own privacy.Overall had the best 3 days any could ever have!!!Thanks :)

3 days Western Cape WOW. So...we had a wonderful experience during our 3 day tour with Z! They clearly know what they're doing here and have it down to a science. There really is so much to see on the Western Cape...and although you can do it yourself...choosing to go with this tour was a brilliant idea in retrospect. It's small groups that are well guided.Our driver/ tour guide was easy going, knowledgeable and very patient considering us 3 girls probably drove him crazy! I highly recommend going with hotspots. We'll likely come back and go on the 5 day Garden Route next time...see you soon Z!

"4 day Garden Route Tour". I had the most amazing time on my garden route tour with Isaac as our tour guide! He was informative, funny, and very down to earth. Our group happened to be all ladies and he did an amazing job making us feel comfortable and cared for. The bungee jump is a must do and the elephant ride was such an unforgettable experience. Make sure to brings snacks if possible because we did stop at some places that I was not able to find much to eat. Definitely not ally available for gluten intolerant. Also stay at the back packers hostels! I made the mistake of booking private 3 star option and they weren't even nicer than the hostels! Also, I was under the impression that I would be in a private hotel room since I upgraded but the 3 star accommodation is in someone's actual home! I felt awkward showing up to their house late and ended up staying the the back packers lodge. Definitely request Isaac and do the lion walk and 4x4 game drive!! So content with this trip!

Grand Day On the Cape. great trip packed a lot in one day without feeling hurried. Our guide, "Big G" was gracious, informative, and customized the trip according to our interests. He shared his enthusiasm for his beautiful country. The views were stunning, the penguins are adorable, and the wine was wonderful.
5 day garden route. Such an amazing trip. The tour guide Isaac was great and made the trip very enjoyable. Would recommend to anyone keen on adventure.

Garden route + Safari. An amazing trip with an amazing guide Andrew, and so many new friends during the tour. Without any hesitation, I recommend it to all young adults: adventure, fun, good music in the car, great places to eat and to sleep....the price completly worth it, I assure.

Whale and Wine Tour (2 days). The trip was amazing and our tour guide was even better. We went on a wine tour, the southernmost point of Africa, shark cage dived, saw pinguines, got delicious food, and experienced the beautiful South African country.
2 DAY WILDLIFE AND SAFARI. This tour was absolutely amazing, the long road journey is forgiven by the amazing excursions, wow!!

Best Garden Route Tour. My sister and I had a blast doing the Garden Route with Isaac last week. He made it no secret that his first priority was to make sure we had the best time imaginable. The activities, lodging, transport, and meals were impeccably managed from beginning to end, making it easy to sit back, relax, and enjoy the adventure. Worth every penny!
3 day Garden Route tour. amazing! very well structured and our driver Z couldn't have been any more fantastic! 100% recommend hotspots to anyone visiting South Africa, 10/10!!
Fantastic. Great tour . Well organized. We saw so much in such a short time ! Our guide Maudi was fantastic and really looked after us.

Amazing 7 days with Hotspots2c!. As a solo traveller i decided to book my first week in South Africa so that i would feel safe and get a feeling of how everything works over there. I booked two tours. First the 3day Western Cape Wow and then the 4day Garden Route +J'bay. On both tours i had the amazing guide named Maudi. He was so easy going and nice and i had a great laugh all the time. He was very responsible, knowledgeable and helpfull and also an excellent driver :-) He really made the trips more special for me and the rest of the group. I highly recommend these trips and this company! It was the highlight of my two months trip through the southern parts of Africa. :-)

Perfect way to make the most out of a short time in South Africa!. We had an amazing time on this 4 day tour of the Garden Route! We chose this one because it offered a wide variety of activities (including animal experiences) and also offered hotel pick up and drop off, and was very reasonably priced. We had Andrew as our tour guide and he did a great job! He was very knowledgeable about the areas and was able to answer most of our questions, plus he paid attention to what we interested in and was accommodating (for instance, he would pull over at lookout points whenever he noticed us intrigued by the scenery, without us having to ask or would suggest alternatives such as zip-lining over bungy jumping). There was more time driving than we had anticipated, but because the scenery was so breathtaking, we didn't really mind. The accommodations were very nice (B&B's, clean and comfortable with good breakfasts!). Overall, we had the trip of a lifetime, and this tour helped make that happen!

A one of a kind trip on the Garden Route! . We did have expections... after the research on the net, but this trip was out of the world... exceeded our expections, travelling to see the bushes, farms, sanctuaries, wildlife, mountains, nature trails, beaches, oceans, rivers and lakes.. starting from Oudtshoorn to Wilderness to Jeffrey's bay to Tsitsikamma to Knysna to Mossel bay... it had everything for everybody... made even more special and fun by our helpful and affable guide Andrew and his team. One of our favourite tours... look forward to more...

Amazing 4 days on the Garden route. This is a great tour if you want to see the best of the Garden route. The route is beautiful and is a must-see for anyone coming to South Africa. The tour hits up all the key sites such as Tsitsikamma National Park and Cango caves, etc.We went through all the major towns such as Mossel Bay, Knysna, all the way to Jeffrey's bay in the Eastern cape. All the option activities were absolutely worth it as well (We did almost everything). The accommodations were fantastic - much better than we expected (We opted for the guesthouses but the hostels some of the people on our tour stayed at seemed really nice as well). Oh and our guide Andrew was fantastic! He is extremely knowledgeable and helpful. I definitely recommend this tour to anyone coming to South Africa.

An amazing 4 day adventure. I had the most incredible time on this 4 day tour! At a very reasonable price I was able to stay in some of the most well accommodating and fun hostels, see incredible parts of South Africa and really get the true Garden Route experience. As well, Andrew, my tour guide, was perfect! Incredibly personable, fun and knowledgeable, he made the long car drives, activities and travel dinners a whole lot of fun.A perfect four days!

3 day garden route tour. The tour was really great and Gerard our guide was fantastic and so friendly and helpful! All the activities were planned very well and Gerard was able to tell us lots of interesting information while we drove along!

private tour to Cape Peninsula. Hotspots was arranged for us by the hotel, and it was just amazing. We had tailored tour and visited table mountain, penguins, cape point, mutzenberg and a lot of other places in one day! We had a good balance between getting new information and enjoying new experience according to our own pace.If you ask me now, what I would change If I could. Only one thing I would do differently, take longer tour!Thank you, hotspots for the unforgettable day of exploring the South Africa.Hope to see you again ;)
Only wish I could have booked a longer trip with them!. Absolutely amazing 4 day trip! Met great people and was really worth the money to see! A must do if going to South Africa!

Fantastic time with this group!. We took the 3 day garden route tour from Cape Town. We had just arrived in Africa the day before so we were slightly nervous. Our guide Andrew created a fantastic atmosphere for us to get comfortable in and enjoy our trip. He was incredibly knowledgeable and very friendly which helped us learn a ton about the country and the specific areas we were in. We got to see tons of fantastic things along the route and it felt like the locations chosen by the tour group were perfect and not just some random spots along the way. This tour really helped us get acclimated to South Africa quickly and has even made the rest of our trip more enjoyable because of the mindset it put us in. I highly suggest this trip to anyone, especially during the first part of your trip to South Africa.

Private tour to Oudtshoorn and Cape point. Hotspots were exceptional end to end. Even at the booking stage, my husband and I got terrific help from Nicolette who assisted very graciously with last minute changes. We arrived in Capetown and were received by Juanita who was our private guide for 3 days. She was wonderful. Very helpful and knowledgeable but importantly always smiling, genuinely wanting to help and very flexible as our plans evolved. She knew when we needed alone time and when we wanted more input and info. The arrangements through the tour were also terrific. From a breathtaking experience at Bufelsdrive game lodge in a luxury tent, to close encounters with Ostrich, a pleasant game drive, fantastic visit to Cape Point and Simon's point and capped with wine tasting in Spiers at Stellenbosch - we packed in enough experiences in 3 days to make this a trip of a lifetime. Can't thank the team enough

Incredible Trip for Incredible Price. This trip was such a wonderful way to spend a long weekend. I really enjoying all that was included in the trip, and the optional activities were reasonably priced and a ton of fun. Maudi, our tour guide, did a phenomenal job, and was one of the most thoughtful and organized guides ever! Highly recommend

Great tour!. I had a great time with Hotspots2c with my dad. We did the 4-day Garden Route + Jbay tour and stayed in the 3-star guest houses. I was surprised with how nice the guest houses were and I would highly recommend them. Our tour guide (Maudi) was also very accommodating and did whatever he could to help us make the most of our trip. Even when we chose not to do the optional activities there was always something to do, or a place to relax.

What a surprise!. I joined Hotspots2c for a 2 Day Western Cape Safari tour and it is totally beyond of my expectation. We covered so many attractions: visit a game farm where we saw many wild animals, walk with lions (pay extra), feed the elephants and ride(pay extra), ostrich farm, .. This is definitely the highlight of my cape town trip.

West Coast wonder!. On 28th March I joined Hotspots on a West coast tour in South Africa.What a unforgettable experience. I can recommend this tour to anyone who wants to experience something unique. This tour gives you the opportunity to relax and enjoy the food and beauty of the west Coast. I also did the Horse riding along the beach, first time ever. We even saw seals playing in the water.They also give you the option to do sky diving, which all us girls did.... All i can say is Wow, I want to do this again. The other highlights was the wine tasting, the National park with its beautiful birds and tranquil sunset at the accommodation and the Lunch with all you can eat South African Food.Thanks again to the great tour guide Gerhard for this tour, I will be back for more.

A Safari where you get to stay in Guesthouses.. Day 1 set the stage. The lion walk was something that I never thought that I would do but I did and I have some great picture of the lions and me. In the afternoon we went for a canoe ride and since I grew up on an island, I love any kind of boat on the water. Day 2 things got even better. First, was the bungee jump. Next waterfall zip-lines. I have been waiting to go to a country where I could do this. This was the highlight on my trip.Day 3 Addo Elephant National Park. I was picked up at 4:00 AM to be driven to the park. We went for a 2 hour game ride in a 4x4 vehicle. It looked a lot like an army truck. It was an open truck with a roof and very cold. We were given a poncho. Some people even had blankets. It was so much fun looking for and finding elephants, zebras, flightless dung beetle, and other animals. The African zebras have brown stripes and are very pretty. Took lots of pictures.Day 4 - Rode an Ostrich at the Ostrich Farm. So much fun and went to the Cango caves. I love caves.Day 5 - So much fun to ride and feed the elephants.Every day I did something that I had never done before. Lots of driving from one place to another but so worth it.Every day I did something that I had never done before.

Amazing 6 days on the Garden Route. Thank you very much for this amazing trip! We did such a lot of things in these few days. Everything was well organised and planned. The food was excellent, such as our guides Isaac and Zaahid. Both of them made our trip so much fun, especially Zaahid, who threw us into the water and always had something funny to say.
Hotspots2c Gardenroutetour. Amazing Tour, great guides and adventures i will never forget, the backpackers were always comfortable and the places beautiful. Thumbs up!

Garden tour + Addo. I had a fabulous time, experienced lots of things I never thought I would do... Walking with lions, elephant riding, cheetah encounter and the zip wiring was great... Isaac our tour guide made the trip great fun, I loved his enthusiasm and constant smiley face!! I would definitely choose to travel with Hotspots again but I would double check who would be travelling in the minibus as I would have preferred a variety of ages and nationalities.

Garden Route + J’bay with Maudi. I went on a 4 day Garden Route tour this past Easter weekend. We saw so many amazing things. The Cango Caves adventurous tour is a must to see and the canoe trip with Maudi was so much fun! He was our Tour Guide an I have to say he was the best Tour Guide! He knows a lot and is funny too. So for every woman outside there, you have to know, he's single and available! ;-) Thank you for this big experience!

Awesome 2 days safari at Oudtshoorn & Garden Route. This 2 days tour was amazing, we had the opportunity to do a safari by jeep and different experiences with animals, such as elephants, lions, ostriches... It was an incredible experience that I will never forget. I don't remember the name of our guide (I think that he was Joseph, but I'm not sure), but he was always very kind and patient. After the trip, I recommended it to all my friends :)

Hot Spots2c South Africa (Garden route and Safari with Zaahid). First off, I want to thank Zaahid for his enthusiasm, knowledge and compassion as our tour guide. 'Z' demonstrated professionalism and a level of cultural sensitivity which gave rise to a strong bond amongst the other tourists (from different countries) which was something I appreciated. He was very knowledgable of the regions we toured, and encouraged questions and dialogue around the culture of SA. Lastly, Zaahid's mission from the start was to have us enjoy every waking moment of the trip, and encouraged us to step out of our comfort zones. Thank you 'Z'! You the man. Second, the trip itself was fantastic. From being picked up on day one, to taking in the beautiful scenery, bungee jumping, riding elephants, speaking to natives, walking with lions, to being dropped off on day three, Spots2c has done a wonderful job coordinating and executing this tour. The trip was done very efficiently and professionally. They pick you up, you load your luggage which is kept locked in a trailer, and you explore South Africa to see phenomenal views, learn about the history and culture and enjoy some adventurous activities. If you're looking for a way to your South Africa, hotspots2c would be the choice, and they offer a variety of packages and durations. Already looking forward to my return to SA.
Awesome 3 Day Garden Route tour!. Our tour guide Moudy was fantastic! We had a great time! Can't wait to go back to SA! Everything went great, from pick up to drop off

5 Day garden Route + Addo. We had a great time with good people on this tour. It reminded us that what you do is important, but doing it with friendly and good people makes it so much more memorable. Zaahid is a great tour guide who works in mysterious ways. The activities were so much fun and enjoyable. The Cango caves tour was interesting... Overall we hated the experience and we hope never to do this again, Zaahid. Just kidding, we had such a great time and we would recommend this tour to anyone looking for a fun filled African experience!Greets, Sophie (England) and Dino (Holland)

5 Day Garden Route & Addo. Fantastic experience- beautiful country, friendly people and great activities. Our guide Zaahid was our entertainer, motivator and photographer ensuring group participation in activities, leading us in most (except bungee jumping!). Full of useful and useless information, he encouraged us to practice our Afrikaan phrases courtesy of Juanita. Well organised tour, excellent guides and interesting group of travellers/friends ensured this was a great experience.

3 day garden route + safari. Great trip, full of options for everybody! The tourguide was very knowledgeable and fun :-) it was great to drive a part of the garden route and I really liked the kayak in Wilderness. The hostels on route were great, very relaxed. So if you only have limited time, this tour is your gateway to the garden route!

Interesting and nice! But always in a hurry.... I did the 3 days Western Cape Wow Tour with Isaac as our guide! He was very funny and informativ! The only thing I didn't like was that you're always in a hurry. But when you're going to do so many things in just 3 days you have to expect that..

Best experience of my life!. Hi!Your tour guide Isaac is one of the most amazing people I have met in my life. He made the experience that much more enjoyable. I got to ride an elephant, walk with lions and a ton of other cool things. Thank you so much!!Tiffany

leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller. My favourite travel quote for the most surreal and most amazing experience I had.I joined a 2day Wildlife + Safari tour with Hotspots2c, after counting down the days to my tour it was finally here. Zaahid was our tour guide,and he immediately made you feel welcomed and got us all very excited for our trip which lay ahead. Our first taste of adventure was a 4x4 Game Drive, in the most spectacular game reserve. We were able to see so many wild animals in their natural habitat as well as get a friendly 'hello' by a Giraffe passing by. Next was Walking with lions, I have no idea how to describe how amazing this was, other then the experience was so surreal. From here, we headed to our Backpacker accommodation where we spent the night, and what a fun, lively place it was.We were up bright and early for a wonderful breakfast and then we headed to the elephants, this was my favorite part of the tour!! these animals are so loveable and even showed us how they can even kick a football! At the Cango Wildlife Ranch I got to touch a cheetah and Lemars and go cage dive with the crocs, it was incredible being so close to these wild animals. All in the all this was the most amazing tour, and i was able to tick so many things off my bucket list !

5 Day Garden Route + Addo = Incredible!. This tour was great & our tour guide Gerhard was AMAZING!My husband and I took this tour because a friend recommended it and we were so happy we did. It covered so many beautiful places along the Garden Route. We opted for the 4 star B&B stay though we were debating the 3 star v 4 star. The company recommended 4 star because of a night at Buffelsdrift. Well, we didn't know what any of this meant but we took their advice and were so happy! Our accommodations each night were incredible, to say the least. We slept so well and felt like each day was its own mini-vacation in a new part of the country at a new, adorable B&B. And Buffelsdrift was out of this world awesome. It was the best night of our entire 2.5 week trip to South Africa. The tent we stayed in was gorgeous - nicer than the tents we stayed in at our 5 day safari a week later! We saw tons of animals come right to our front door!But, back to Gerhard. He made our trip perfect. He went out of his way to make us comfortable and happy all day, every day. He made reservations for us, drove us to special places/restaurants, and stopped whenever we wanted to see something along the way. Though we paid for the extra safari drive at Addo, our drive through afterward with Gerhard in the van was EVEN BETTER! I know it doesn't make sense that seeing animals from a van could be better than seeing animals from a safari truck but it was better because Gerhard made it so much fun. We went what felt like everywhere in the park with him and saw so many animals. He helped us take pictures and get close to so many great animals.Overall, we'd highly recommend this tour to anyone traveling - as long as you understand it's ideally designed for a younger crowd of backpackers (at least our van was) but we found the value was incredible, the sites were selected perfectly, the accommodations couldn't have been better, and Gerhard made it extraspecial. Thank you Gerhard!!

Garden Route. Hello,I really enjoyed having Paul as a tour guide. He provided us with really helpful knowledge on not only the geography and animals ofSA but also the political structure and how things work. He was very informative and I cannot say enough good things about him. I think the rest of the group will also attest to that. Very good at his job. I really enjoyed the lion walk and elephant ride as well. Thanks!

beautifull garden route!. I travelled alone in south africa. I took a tour with hotspots2c and the 5 day garden route and addo elephant park were amazing !The 5 days were really bussy but you see everything in 5 days. Our tour guid Isaac was really great tour guide with a lot of humor.I would recommand this trip to everybody and if you travel alone this is a great opportunity to make some new friends.Kind regards Astrid Bakker

3 days Garden Route. Was really amazing ! 3 days of Happiness with a good guide ! The Bungy Jump was totally amazing and the safari too ! Myoli Beach for the sunset was so beautiful ! Isaac our guide was really friendly and he knows everything, you can ask a lot of questions about Africa he knows all about it ! South Africa is the best place !

The Garden Route experience. The Garden route was part of our honeymoon experience - and it made very good memories! We had Zaheed who led this road trip and made it informative and fun! Zaheer - always in control of the drive also made you feel the spirit of Africa - we learnt a few local words and shared many a laughs en route this picturesque journey! My favourite was Jeffreys bay, the canoeing down the wilderness and definitely the trip to ADDO! Although we missed the early morning Safari - the nature gods made up for it - there was an exquisite show of wild animals in their natural habitat and leading them were the elephants - we just loved the sights and sounds of the nature reserve. being our honeymoon - Hotspots arranged a special night at a private game reserve - this was the icing on the cake and made such a difference to our trip. I liked the fact that the trip was not packed with activities - it had its share of adventure but also ample time for relaxation! Keep it up Hotspots!

5 day garden route. So me and my friend did the 5day garden route tour. Our guide Zaahid was amazing! The best guide ever. Always in a good mood, looking after us and pushing us out of our comfortzone. We did the safari in addo and got to see 150 elephants swimming in the waterhole. Jeffreys Bay was amazing. A really good tour that got better with our guide Zaahid:)

5 days garden route. We have ben on the 5 days garden route. We had a great trip! Our guide Zaahid was amazing! Always did the little extra, and answered all our many questions. We wil never forget this trip. Thank you!

Awesome tour/company/driver. Zaahid Sylvester was our driver and guide for the 3 day garden route, and we all had an incredible time. Give this man a raise. He was interesting, well mannered, and loads of fun. The whole trip was enjoyable from beginning to end. Highly recommend.

Xenny was fantastic. This trip was packed with so many amazing animals experiences. We walked with lions road elephants and patted cheetahs. It all wouldn't be the same without Xenny and his humour and fantastic personality.

2 day safari/garden route. Recently went on this trip with the fantastic Gerhard! The trip was great got to see all we needed to see on the 2 days! Drive back, albeit a long drive (but plenty of stops incl Ronnies for Milkshakes) was spectacular. Gerhard was very friendly and knowledgeable and really went out of our way to make sure everyone was looked after. He was organised and had lunch and dinner preordered on our first day. We stayed in 3 star accom as we didn't know how great the backpackers hostel was and we upgraded to the guest house. Wish we stayed at the backpackers as it seemed great fun. Gerhard kindly arranged for us to eat at the hostel with the group (amazing BBQ) and Gerhard dropped us back to our accommodation! If you want a 2 day trip down the garden route to go on safari- do this! It's great value and was the highlight of our South African holiday! There are extras if you wish to pay (loin walk, elephant feeding, various cango encounters etc). We did some as it's a once in a lifetime experience! Please pass on our compliments to Gerhard!

5-Day Garden Route and Addo. I booked this tour quite spontaneous and didn't expect it to be such a great experience. I met nice people and saw beautiful places! Our Guide was Zaahid. He's a nice guy, always ready to go the extra mile for everyone of the group, he was super! This tour would not have been the same without him, he made us feel like friends and he wasn't getting tired of answering all my questions! Thank you!

Awesome 5-day Garden Route and Addo tour!. Our 5-day experience in the Cape was wonderful! Our guide Zaahid was absolutely super and made every effort to give everyone a great time (which we did). It would not have been the same without him. Truly a memorable experience!

Garden Route and Wine Combo. Hey Hotspots Team, it was an amazing Tour for us, especially the Addo, wine and Cheese Tasting, wilderness Canoeing! Every Accomadation was Really great!!!! Our Guide Maudy is such a lovely Person, he gave us so much Information about the Garden Route, the history of South Africa! We really enjoyed every Moment! #welostourhearttosouthafrica Also our Group was amazing( Party Time)

Gerhard the Great. I did the 4 day Garden tour. I normally don't do tours as I like to do my own thing but on this occasion only had limited time so decided to do it. I needn't have worried because the tour was great...mostly thanks to Gerhard the guide who was really knowledgeable and made the whole thing really relaxed. I got to see the things I wanted and would recommend this as a way to see the Garden route and key attractions if you have a limited amount of time or if you're travelling alone.

2days Wildlife & Safari. What is Africa without wildlife and safari?! I had a great time on the trip that had the coolest tourguide Zaahid. He risked his life to capture great moments on the group's cameras and phones! :)The hostel was comfortable and the food they served was great! One note of critisism (I forgot to tell Z): the lionwalk was optional, but not clear to everyone in the group. They presumed everybody was doing the walk, without asking before it started. One groupmember had to pay afterwards and it can be a lot of money for somebody. But all over two days to remember!

5 days Garden Route. I really enjoyed the tour. We were a group of 11 Ladies, 10 at the age of 18-24 and me with 56years. We always felt very comfortable with our exellent, intelligent an friendly guide Paul. He exlained many things about south afrika and his animals and he made us feel quite comfortable.To get an overview in a short time always advisable. The accommodation was fine, and we loved the braai with ostrich and the marshmallows in Oudshorn(Backpackers Paradies), the T-bone steak in Jeffries bay( Backpackers Island) and the Braai in Sedgefield (Afro Vibe Backpackers.The elephant riding and feeding was awesome, Addo was great, Tsitsikama interessting.But the most exituing ting was the JUMP!!!!! I love it. Hotspots2c always again.Trudi

5 days garden route. It was just awesome! Great tour with a excellent guide.Juste a "once in a lifetime-experiance",(touching elephants, bungee jumping, meet "king julian" etc) well organised, perfect guided and unforgettable! Thanks to hotspots and specially Zaahid for this great tour.

2 day's Hotspots2c Adventure weekend. We really enjoyed our weekend from the beginning till the end. The activities were definitely highlights and 'must sees' ! The elephant ride was amazing and the ostrich farm was interesting. It was pity that we couldn't visit the Cango Caves while we were there though. The guides were both very friendly and answered every question. We liked the surprises of Ulrich and we felt comfortable having him as a driver.The accommodation was fine, and we loved the bunfire and the marshmallows.

3 DAYS SAFARI CAPE TOWN.. Was an excellent experience ...our guide was amazing very polite and he always made all possible to made our trip perfect..the atractios was the best we were 8 all of diferents nationalities but we did all the activities...bungue jump "awesome" ..lions walk and alephant feed and ride incredible and the same about thr places....hotspots2c is the best option ♥♡

Worth your time and money. Went on the two day hotspot tour this past weekend. It was great! Our tour guide was issac and he was so sweet and helpful. Very thoughtful of all of his guests. We saw a majority of the animals on the safari part. Granted it was in a game reserve, it was still fun. Our guide for the 4 x4 did not offer blankets and we all were frozen so if you are going out on this be sure to dress warm. And I mean warm! It is spring and we still froze. Saw lions, rhinos,giraffes,zebras, ostrich and their babies. Wasn't too happy with this guide but overall, this part was good. The accommodations we had at a bAnd b were perfect. Walking distance to sweet little restaurant called nostalgia. Delicious food. The only drawback there was no wifi at B and B so we couldn't check our iPad pics.The second day of safari was fun! Started with elephant walk. Again, Isaac was helpful! That was my favorite part! Then we went to a animal reserve. A great second day.. We also walked with the lions and that was amazing but scary. My friend did a cheetah meet and liked it.Overall, I enjoyed it and we stopped at Ronnie's sex shop for burgers and chips on way back. Get your cameras ready. The ride from Cape Town is spectacular beyond words!

Best Way To Cover South Africa! Hotspots2c the best thing to happen to me. Ahhh! Well where should I start from..our tour guide Juanita Volker was absolutely fabulous,she made everyone so comfortable right from the start and told us all the things and places where we were traveling in complete detail,she was just awesum,more then that a very loving person with a great heart,without her such an amazing experience was not possible,all the activities we did were just out of this world ,starting from elephant ride and feed,ostrich farm,the safari,lion walk,bungee jump bridge walk,cargo caves,the list is endless,we stayed at guest houses as well as backpackers but with private rooms as we were a couple,but all of them we just stunning,the lively atmosphere at the backpackers dorm was brilliant,all the places we went had super views from the room,I can't thank Juanita much,it's all coz of her and hotspots my trip was memorable,would love to come back specially for this

Now I love africa !. The 6-day garden route was an awesome and amazing trip. I will never forget it. I feed an elephant , saw lions,giraffes, kudus, zebras and much more. The best experience for me was the ostrich farm and to ride on an ostrich. The accommodations were everytime perfect like a hotel. The bus driver / tour guide was everytime very pollite, friendly and very funny. After this never forgettable tour I can say : I love africa . Thank you so much hotspot 2c !!!! Greetings Saskia

Best time of my life. Hostspots2C gave me the best time of my life. I saw, lions, zebras, rhinos, elephants and giraffes. I rode on ostriches, fed elephants and had the absolute best experience in my entire life: I did the worlds higher bridge-bungee-jump. The driver and tourguide was so nice and polite, the accommodations were always awesome... Hotspots2C gave me sooo many experiences, adventures and hotspots to see, I can just say: Thank You, thank you, THANK YOU

2 day safari, ostrich and elephant riding, ranch tour. The tour was fantastic. Definitely got our money's worth for everything we did. Probably one of the best choices we did during our vacation in Cape Town. Andrew, our tour guide, was probably one of the best tour guides we had for any tour we did during our stay. There were 5 of us in our group and we all loved him. He absolutely went above and beyond to make sure that we were comfortable and content with the tour. Both the 2 day tour and Andrew were amazing.

Simply the best. Taking part in the garden route with four fellow Brit girls & two Americans was always gonna be fun but I never expected the overall trip to be so amazing!!!!!Charlene was our tour guide & made everything flow from the word go - she has so much knowledge about the history of Cape Town & South Africa as well as adding extra points into experiences, sites & location from her own experiences made it more real - it was very refreshing. The backpackers which we stayed in were great!!! Loved the open fire & ostrich BBQ one the first night and equally loved the on the beach hostel too. Ate the most amazing shrimps - recommended by Charlene whilst there as well as purchasing some fresh water pearl earrings (also pointed out by Charlene) which Ive been wearing ever since. Also loved the road kill cafe & town we visited at very beginning of tour. Both hostels had a wicked vibe - defo return to both!!Experiences were all brilliant & even though the 4x4 was cancelled at one location due to bad weather.. Other alternatives were given to the group which was very good!!! (Not mentioning being stuck in mud hahaha) Fun & games. Loved this weekend - would enjoy taking part in a longer tour tooKeep up the good workI'm sure Charlene deserves a promotion!!!!
Amazing experience!. Hotspots2c really delivered an unforgettable experience for me and my friends. Our tour guide was one of the most knowledgeable and friendly individuals I've met during my trip.

More than expected. I booked a couple of excursions with HotSpots2C while studying abroad in SA. I did a day long safari and a 5 day long Garden Route Tour. Both exceeded my expectations. Zaahid, my bus driver, was by far the coolest guide I had ever met. He was always willing to go out of his way to help us and make sure we saw and did everything. Definitely some of the best times I had in SA. Definitely perfect for college-age people looking for an awesome, thrill-filled time.

awesome 2 day trip. The tour i went on was awesome, great animal encounters, the crocodile dive was my personal highlight and the safari with its very knowledgeable guides will never be forgotten, i cannot rave enough about this trip and the tour guide Marlyn made the trip even better, great guy and a good laugh along the way- we are both big rugby fans :) !Thanks very much for a great trip, i will definately be recommending you guys to anyone who goes to Cape Town

One of the Most Fulfilling Trips. Our guides Juanita& Zaahid embodied UBUNTU to the max. Breath-taking nature, beautiful people, best trip! The proportion of fun, rest, sight-seeing, nature encounter, and meaningful conversation were just perfect! Highly Recommending the 5-day Garden Route for all nature lovers.

Well worth the money!!! Great Value!. Our tour guide Isaac was an amazing person!!! We loved him!!! He was very knowledgeable about all the places we visited. I saw some of the most beautiful sights I have ever seen in my life. It was so nice to have all of the little details handled for me so I could just relax and enjoy my trip! I would highly recommend Isaac and Hotspot!!! Well done, would go again tomorrow!!

Incredible fun-packed 5 days. Gerhard was a great guide and he had many snippets of information about every hotspot we went! From bungee-jumping to elephant cuddling! Tons of things crossed out from my bucket list! Great ride and great fun with hotspots2c

Experience South Africa with Hotspots2c!. I booked two of the Hotspots2c tours during my visit to Capetown .... their 3-day Western Cape WOW tour and their 2-day Wildlife and Safari. I loved them both! Inexpensive, yet completely memorable! The WOW tour made stops in Hout Bay, Cape Point, Cape of Good Hope, Stellenbosch for wine tastings at two wineries, Cape Agulhas, Hermanus, and Betty's Bay (to see the penguin colony). A tour of the Kayamandi Township and Chapman's Peak Drive were included, as well as the (optional) opportunity to go shark cage diving or whale-watching. Talk about seeing everything in one tour! The Wildlife and Safari tour drove the famous Route 62 and included a mini 4x4 big 5 game drive on a wildlife reserve, time at the Cango Ostrich Farm and Wildlife Ranch with opportunities to interact with various animals, an elephant ride at an elephant rescue reserve, and a lion walk. Again, so many unique, memorable experiences all in one weekend!If/when we return to South Africa, I won't hesitate to book tour with Hotspot2c again!!!

Some fun? Hotspots2c!. If you want to meet nice people, have a nice tour guide, nice places to stay and all in all a really nice trip. I will never forget my Trip with Hotspots2c! Thanks so much, NICE!

The trip of a lifetime. Taking a trip with hotspots2c was a last minute decision that I will never regret! Had the best 10 days of my life. Always something to do or something beautiful to see. With hotspots2c you will never get bored and you will make memories and friends wherever you go. Too bad the ten days passed so quickly :( I would highly recomend this to anyone who is open to new adventures in a relaxed and professional way! Not only will you get to see all there is to see in South, you'll be doing it the best way and with the best guide and driver. Xenny is amazing, happiest, funniest, and simply the best driver+guide you could ever ask for! A vacation I'll remember forever! :)

Cape Point, Boulders beach, and Wine tasting tour. We had an amazing trip. The scenery during the drive was breathtaking and the destinations were even more so. The food at the restaurant was also delicious. It was definitely a day to remember. Our tour guide, Paul, was very professional and passionate about his country. You can ask him about anything from local animals/plants to socio-economics and political issues in the country. We will definitely come back to Cape Town and will be happy to use your service again.

An unforgettable experience. I was in Cape Town at the end of May 2014, and for three days I visited the city together with Cathleen, a prepared and adorable guide that made me discover this wonderful city and its surroundings. It was an unforgettable experience.

Amazing tours even better tour guides! . I went on two tours with Hotspots during my time in South Africa. Both were so fun. Charlene was my tour guide on the second weekend. What a fun guide to have. Gerhard was my guide for the first tour and he too was awesome. He knew so much history. Charlene gave us such a free spirited and fun tour of the Garden route. Walking with the lions was a life changing experience as well. Highly recommend!!

If you could do one tour, it would definitely be this one!. Incredible tour! Would absolutely recommend to anyone who is considering doing this. The wildlife and people were simply amazing! Also could not have asked for a better guide, shoutout to Isaac. The most he outputs and funny person I've ever met! Super informative and all round a good bloke. Had the time of my life,!Thankyou hotspots!

Custom tour of South Africa care of Hotspots2c. Good quality vehicles, amazing accommodation, great sites, and FANTASTIC guides. We had Zaahid and Morty, and they really made the trip as fantastic as it was - not only did they take wonderful care of us so we didn't have to worry about anything, but they became our instant friends. Johan, the owner, managed to fit everything into a very short time frame and he made it work really well. Five star service.

The best experience ever.. Amazing!!! This company is wholeheartedly dedicated to their customers. They bent over backwards for my group and I to make sure we were all accommodated. The tour guided were VERY knowledgable about the areas we drove through, and they took excellent care of us! They provide amazing packages, at amazing prices, that give you the BEST of South Africa! Thanks so much!!

Private Cape Point Tour. This was my second customized tour with this company and I'm so impressed with the personalization and fun they put into sharing their country, culture, history and sites with visitors. Xenny was so entertaining and knowledgeable, even taught us/showed us how to make a Springbok!!!! Lekker!See you again in a few weeks and then again in August! No worries, you cannot go wrong travelling and experiencing South Africa with Hotspots2c!

A trip to remember!. My tour was amazing (and I’m not always using this term like some american guys), especially because of the driver! It was a pleasure to spend time with him!If you are travelling alone, such a trip is an opportunitiy to meet new friends from all around the world!Sam (from Zürich, Switzerland)

must do with hotspot2c in South Africa. I was beyond my expectation while travelling with hotspot2c. I booked my trip directly to hotspot2c with Ferdi by email. And it was the best experienced so far for 1 week w/ hotspot. The tour was exceptional. If your young and want adventure, you must book the garden route+ western cape (7days) and MUST DO the optional tour they offered. I left my brand new sneakers in the trailer when Maudi my tour guide dropped me off on my last day of the tour. Contacted Ferdi from the main office... and believe it or not, Maudi returned my shoes at my Hotel in Cape Town. Thank you Ferdi and Maudi from HotspotAlways,Randy

2day Wildlife Tour with Xenny. We booked the 2day Wildlife + Safari (including Elephant Experience) with Hotspots2C, I contacted them via email bombarding them with questions and Ferdi was excellent, always quick to respond and very informative. We attended the tour on 22nd March 2014 and our guide Xenny collected us from the hotel around 7am. What a great guy Xenny is, an excellent guide, friendly and enthusiastic, he really looked after us all, nothing was too much to ask of him.We headed out to Oudtshoorn after collecting everyone for the tour, it took about six hours drive from Cape Town but Xenny allowed plenty of stops for us. We managed to pack so much into the 2 days – but the highlights for us were the elephant experience, lion walk and the 2 hour safari game drive. We also paid extra and stayed in a game lodge for the night instead of the hostel which really added to the experience.The tour was excellent value for money and brilliant at ticking everything off what we wanted to see on our trip, we would definitely recommend using this company, but please note it is aimed more for the younger backpackers/volunteers as it is very active.

4 days garden route trip. our tour guide, Zaahid S.or Mr Z. to those who could not pronounce his name,was a native South African with a lot of knowledge of landscape, geography, history...of the area. We were picked up from our hotel with baggage and generous welcomed and treated well during the trip, even during our visit to the ostrich farm I started to feel bad and Mr. Z drove me to a pharmacy after dropping the others and our bags to the backpackers. the route was great we did all that we expected to do in South Africa in a short time period; safari, bungee jumping, sight seeing, getting close to the animals, Canoeing in a beautiful river with a short swim. We were older than the rest of our traveling companions in our late thirties and Mr. Z made sure we were part of the group at all times and kept us all in good spirits thought out the trip talking and answering questions at correct times whilst keeping quiet when the travel required, his driving skills were very useful specially around some of the crazy drivers, he never put our lives in danger and always had time for stop break or a quick sightseeing moment.Hotspots 2 c organized accommodation passes and lunches in quality places with great landscapes and history for us to gain many photos of our dream holiday. We recommend hotspots tours If you visit the Cape and the garden route. Thanks to this tour we did all we expected to do and more in our travel to South Africa, we think that if we would not did this tour our experience there would be lost to booking accommodation, organizing cars and routes and it would be stress and tiring from drivingKind regards,Derek and Eva

A once in a lifetime experience!!. It was the best weekend I've ever have. There were so many wildlife encounters which i liked most. My favorite part of the weekend was the walk with lions and riding and feeding an elephant. Soo great animals!! The tour guide was extremely friendly and gave us lots of great Information about south africa. I will never forget this weekend. Thank you soo much!! Sarah

Lion Walk. It was an amazing trip with everything one could imagine to experience. I saw many unique animals surrounded by a breath-taking landscape. Everything was well-organized and not to forget to mention the nice driver and guides. Thanks a lot for this experience!!!Carolin

3 day garden route tour. A brilliant three days filled with phenomenal scenery, great people and most importantly loads of fun activities! The cango caves tour is brilliant in case your wondering which to chose on day 1! This tour is a must if your on a short trip to Cape Town and want to see more of what South Africa has to offer. My guide Charlene was very knowledgable and I will be booking future trips with hotspots through my time in Cape Town.

5-Day Garden Route Adventure Tour. Maudi was the MAN!!! He was not only our tour guide, he was our protector, brother, and friend.Our group consisted of 9 girls. He was very attentive to our needs. While at an ATM he stepped in and protected us from some very sketchy people who got to close while we were using it. He made sure we were safe at our hostel/guesthouse every night. If he wasn't able to take us back to our lodging at night (because we liked staying out late for dinner) he made sure we had a way to get back safely. The guesthouses/lodgings were clean, safe and comfortable. In some, the views were beautiful! Breakfasts were standard. Eggs cooked to your preference, a variety of cereals and yogurt, lots of fruits. The staff, at the majority of the places, made us feel welcome and at home.Maudi promised that we would see elephants after our very disappointing 0600 game drive. We were all skeptical. He drove back into the park in our tour van and lo and behold!! We saw tons of elephants, buffalo, kudu, dung beetles, and mongooses.He also knows lots of good places to eat. One night we requested ostrich for dinner. He made arrangements and we had delicious ostrich kebabs and sausages!Every day was an adventure!!! We couldn't decide which one we liked most each day. :) There was also lots of down time to rest and relax. I definitely recommend hotspots2c to anyone wanting to see South Africa and experience some memorable adventures!
Great trip and great people. We had a very nice trip on the 3-day-tour from Cape Town to Oudtshoorn and the Garden route. It was perfectly organized, a lot to do in a short time, but never stressing.

3 Day Western Cape + 5 Day Garden Route. I had an amazing time in South Africa- slightly apprehensive about going on my own, but that soon faded as I met the people in my group and the tour leaders. For the 3 day tour my group leader was Gabriel- he was fantastic; not only knowledgeable, but easy to listen to and great fun! On the second half of the trip (5 day garden route) my tour leader was Mori (I think that's how it's spelt!) and he was also great, couldn't have asked for better. I highly recommend this trip, and doing it with Hotspots2c- the organisation of everything and the standard of not only tour leaders, but of the chosen hostels was great. Thank you Hotspots2c!

Highly recommend you book with hotspots2c. The best tour I've been on in South Africa! Highly recommended you book with hotspots2c! I had an awesome experience with them. If you have any questions about the tours just email them, they will answer all of your questions in detail and they response promptly. One of the good things I like about them is they let you choose the type of accommodation you want! If you have more money to spend you could stay at a 3 or 4 stars guesthouse. If you are on a tighter budget like me you can choose to stay at a backpacker. They really have a good choice of accommodations! The backpacker I stayed at was awesome! Very clean and tidy! The other good thing about them is they have good tour guide/driver. The tour I went on was the 2 day wildlife safari tour. Our driver/tour guide was maudi. He did a great job! He took great care of us, was a safe driver. He's also a very friendly and helpful man! We all really appreciated his great job and effort! I will definitely book with hotspots2c again when I visit South Africa.

Had a great time!. Marlyn picked us up for the 3 day Garden Route tour. We saw and played with elephants and tigers, went into caves, canoeing, safari, BUNGEE, swimming, surfing and had a generally awesome time. Our driver Marlyn was really fun and made sure we had the best experience. Definitely a recommended tour (although the 5 day tour is probably even better!)

Highly recommend! Great tour with Maudi!. We did the 5-Day Garden Route tour with guide Maudi in January 2014. It was an amazing experience. Our guide took wonderful care of us, was a safe driver, was very knowledgeable about all the sites, took us to amazing views, catered to our every need. It was an all around amazing experience. We stayed in Cape Town for 3 weeks and by far this tour was our favorite part of the trip! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Garden Route - A Great 4 Days with Charlene!!. We had always wanted to do the Garden Route as we had missed this attraction the last time we visited South Africa....extremely glad that we did it this time over 4 days as we saw such a lot and had an excellent guide in the person of Charlene, who is not only very knowledgeable about the flora and fauna but was familiar with the roads and an excellent driver. We were 6 in the group, both of us in our 70's and the other four who were youngsters in their early 20's...but Charlene managed to keep all happy and contented with the activities lined up for the group. We had a great time during the tour, and at meals as Charlene knew where to eat...and what was good eating!The guesthouses we stayed in which were booked by Hotspots2c were great value....clean, comfortable and friendly and hospitable.We are happy to recommend Hotspots2c and this attraction...but would add that we were lucky to have Charlene....so when you book, ask for her and see if you are lucky as we were...! ;o)

Easy going. This tour helped me and my friend see literally all hotspots we want to see on the Garden Route (we did the 5 day tour). Our tour guide was very friendly and even was willing to bring us wherever we wanted to have dinner!The bus is fine to travel in and as long as you are chilled with your group you are easy to have a good time.

Excellent 4day Garden Route tour with Fayrouz. We have excellent memories to the 4day Garden Route tour with Fayrouz in August this year. Everything was perfectly organized. We enjoyed the explanations and company of Fayrouz very much. Good transport and food and nice guesthouses where everybody was really friendly and helpful.The visits, the company and the nice weather made this tour one we will not easy forget. Highly recommended. Fayrouz many thanks again. We hope to have another opportunity to tour with you!

Worst tour!!!. This has to be the worst tour I have ever been. We all found out that Hotspot2c overbooked and used a fill in guide. The tour was rushed and even lunch and dinner was of second priority. The route was altered to save time by the guide and we ended up doing the itineary in reverse, which made for long drive with nothing to do. I booked thismtour via viator. There has been many good reviews for this trip. Please make sure that they do not use a fill in guide. Please be warned.

The best part of our trip to South Africa!. My partner and I went a tour of the Garden Route with this tour company and we found it became the most enjoyable part of our entire two-week trip to Cape Town and also our favourite of all the tours we went on. The booking service through their website was excellent with prompt email confirmation of payment and details of trip. On the morning of pick-up we were collected on time and were so relieved to have been greeted by such a friendly, helpful and easy-going tour guide (Isaac). Unlike a particularly annoying tour guide we had encountered from another company a few days before (which almost put us off from going on any other tours!), Isaac was friendly without being too intrusive and too over-enthusiastic/loud. He was also amazingly helpful and accommodating throughout the whole of our tour, and the fact that he was able to maintain this while managing several young adults on such a tight schedule was hugely impressive. The same can be said of his driving skills! The van was also very comfortable even at high speed along the N2. Personal possessions were kept safe and secure at times in the van and locked trailer. The activities included in the itinerary were also first-class. If you enjoy outdoor activities (kayaking, swimming, climbing, bungee-jumping) and wildlife/nature experiences you will not be disappointed! Accommodation was also excellent. As me and my partner are slightly older we chose the guesthouse options which (although beautiful) we later regretted as the backpacker hostels were much trendier and equally as comfortable! Most fun could be had at the hostels in the evenings and the food/drink at these hostels were both cheap and delicious. We wished we had booked a private room in the hostel instead, especially as the others on our tour who stayed at the hostel were so friendly and fun-loving.I was quite worried before I went on this tour that it would be too rushed, as we had heard from other people that 72 hours to cover the Garden Route would not be enough. Well I could not disagree more - we were able to cover both Route 62 and the whole of the Garden Route along the N2 within this time without feeling rushed at all. This was due to the supreme planning and organisation of hotspots2c, and the well-paced and interesting itinerary/route. We had also originally planned to hire a car and explore the Garden Route ourselves, but I can honestly say that we wouldn't have seen or experienced half the things we did on this tour if we had done so. So in short, I would throughly recommend doing any tour with this company. They are enjoyable, extremely well-planned and well-executed and a bonus is that they are relatively cheap as well so provide excellent value for money.

South Africa Winelands. We had a wonderful private tour with Gabriel of 4 beautiful wineries where we tasted many wines and cheese. Since we prefer white wines, Gabriel customized our itinerary once he found that out -- the benefit of a private tour. Gabriel is very knowledgeable about the wine area -- the history and the wines AND he is so nice and easy to talk to. The transport vehicle was clean, comfortable, and safely driven. Our first experience with HotSpots2C but it won't be the last.

The best anniversary ever!. Some may say that couples should go on their first anniversary alone, but we will never regret the time we spent with Hotspots2C. We just could not decide on what to do for our anniversary and came across the brocher of Hotspots2C. We took the four day trip and enjoyed it so much. Maudi made everyday special. We did not have to drive our selves which made it so much nicer as both of us could do sight seeing all the time. We would definitely recommend this trip to anyone as it is fun, relaxing and cost effective. Thank you to Hotspots2C for making our anniversary so much fun and very special.

Another Incredible Trip With Hotspots2c. I've toured with Hotspots2c 3 times and I couldn't be happier with my experiences. Not only do I recommend them in the highest of regards, but quite frankly there is no other way to see South Africa! From start to finish Hotspots was professional, timely, accommodating, and flexible with my group. My most recent trip with Hotspots was a special one at that. With Hotspots help I was able to plan and organize a trip with a group of less privileged children I'd been working with. After living and teaching in the Township of Kayamandi, for 4 months, it became mine and a friends goal to provide a few of these awesome kids with the chance to see and experience their own beautiful country. With that idea I knew exactly who to contact and Hotspots helped us out every step of the way! If you'd like to read more about our trip feel free to visit, www.OSullivansTravels.com I can't express enough how amazing our trip was and the impaction it will forever have on those children. I'll forever be thankful of the friendship I've made with Hotspots. To make things even better, we had my great friend Isaac as our tour guide. This man in legendary and a true master of guides. I really appreciate everything you do and look forward to our next adventure together!NdiyaKuthana Hotspots2cSincerely,Chris O'Sullivan

An amazing experience. Thank you Hotspots2C and especially our guide Isaac for an amazing time. The trip was really nice including all the accommodations where we were staying, the food we were eating, the information we were getting and all the excursions as well. Within those 4 days I was riding an elephant and an ostrich, I climd through tight caves, visited beautiful landscapes and did the bungy jump. What I really like about the tour is that the guests were young and that everybody could experience as much of the nightlife as they wanted. They could get wild at night or just rest for the next day.Thank you very much again.

Eventful and great trip with the perfect tourgroup. When we started the tour, one thing was obvious: this group is tiptop especially our tourguide Isaac who tends to exaggerations and ironic statements. When we went to such "dangerous" and "life-threatening" trips he always wanted to make sure if we left our creditcards in the car just for the case we wouldn't come back alive. Isaac is always good for some jokes :) Not only the guide but also the tour on the whole with all the places we went to were simply great! Elefant riding, ostrich farm, mysterious and challenging cango caves, relaxing boat trip, best thing in the world: bungy jump of the world's highest bridge, really advisable; shopping in the outlet stores of billabong and Co. at j-bay, nice hiking through tsitsikama nationalpark, swimming in the indian ocean, big5 game drive etc... Absolutely exciting, never boring, so many expressions and so much to see. Also the hostels were a dream, 2 of them directly at the beach, very clean and nice furnishing. So in general the 4 day Garden Route Tour is definitely a good choice and worth the money. It includes impressions and experiences you won't forget and shouldn't miss. Also the funniest guide in the world Isaac contributed to this great adventure :-)
Gardenroute January 2013. It was the best tour ever! Awesome!!!Thanks to Xeny and team who made it special!!! Looking forward to book again! Hugs Dolma

3 day Garden Route and Safari. Fantastic experience. Xenny was terrific. He made us feel so welcome and had all the information that we needed. We were made feel special and cared for on this tour.Highly recommended tour. Hotspots2c are great touring company

The most wonderfully filled four days of my life.. Stephanie is an amazing tour guide with a great sense of humor which made the trip an awesome experience. Her flexibility allowed us to make our itinerary more fitting and I enjoyed every moment of it. Sad at having to end this awesome trip.

wow Western cape tour. Can't say enough good things about this tour company. They have excellent customer service and accommodations, sights, and guide were all great. We were lucky enough to have Maudi as our guide. He was simply the best. His personality, excellent knowledge of the area, interesting stories and wonderful sense of humour added so much to the tour. Thanks again, Maudi!
animal interaction. very nice exeperience to have the possibility to see and interact with the African animals, guided by a friendly driver: Moudi.very recommendable!

2 days wildlife tour+safari. amazing 2 days tour into the wildlife along scenic landscapes. excellent organization by hotspots2c thanks to our special guide: Moudi. I enjoyed mostly the interaction with the lemurs and the ride on the elephants. Nice experience!!!!
Absolutely amazing!. This two-day wildlife excursion is absolutely worth it! It's a MUST-DO for Cape Town visitors. Our guide, Maudi, was excellent, very helpful, and knowledgeable.

AWESOME weekend away. I did the 2 day Wildlife + safari with Xenny and nine Aviva volunteers from four different countries s and we all had a fantastic weekend. Our first stop , Ronnie`s Sex Shop, which is legend on Route 65.At the ostrich farm we learnt all about the amazing bird and got to ride and feed them .Then off to ride and feed the elephants. What a great time we had, the elephants are so gentle. WOW what an experience. Sunday after breakfast it was off to the Cango Wildlife Ranch , where we were taken around by a very knowledgeable guide , then we had the opportunity to have one on one encounters with some of the animals . Tigers, Lemurs, and Cheetahs to mention a few. Our last stop a 2 hour game drive where we got to see all the Big 5 . There were plenty stops along the way to grab a bite to eat and drink. If you want to see tons of animals I highly recommend this trip and price wise it is worth every cent spent.Thank you all at Hotspots2c for an AWESOME weekend .

It couldn't be better !. My Southafrican adventure comes to an end ! I began to miss it . During our long stay in SA I booked 2 Tours through Hotspots2c. The best choice I could do .We had 3 wonderful days on the West Coast guided by Fayrouz . She is exceptional ! So guest oriented , so helpful and so joyful ! Such a complex and such a splendid person ! Thank you a lot to make us so happy !The next trip was the 4 Days Garden Route . The best part of the South. Eon , our guide was more than a guide ; he was a friend , he was a perfect driver and describer; he knows everything and gave us lots of information; he is such a positive and perfect person . We ended to love him ! Thank you many times, Eon !On both trips we had beautiful accommodation in very different and 4 Stars Hotels/Guesthouses , good and tasty breakfasts . Both guides organized some special dinners for us , we enjoyed those evenings a lot .Both Tours exceeded our expectations and are worth each penny. We enjoyed every moment and recommend them warmly to anybody travels in that part of the world. Kind regards to Fayrouz and Eon and to our travel companions

BEYOND EXPECTIONS. Everything on this package booked with Hotspots exceeded our expections. The guide, Eon Rabe, was exceptional. He was very knowledgeable of the areas we visited and made the trip a pleasure. The accomodations for all three nights were at 4-star guest houses and the package oiginally said 3-star. We also had excellent dinners (not included in the package), but the guide knew the good restaurants in the area. There were numerous excursions that added to the experience. We priced other Garden Route packages, and this was by far the best for the money. Highly recommended!!!
Really really good!. I went on safari and Everything was perfect! The bus, the room. Our guide (Xenny) was excellent! I really recommend Hotspots

4 Day Garden Route Tour with Maudi. Thank you very much Maudi, for the time we had with you. You really are the best driver and entertainer at the same time the world has ever seen.I will recommend you and hotspots and hope that one day we will see you again. :)Best WishesVera

Awesome 4 Day Garden Route Tour with Maudi. Thank you Maudi, for being our great guide and an awesome taxi driver. You're the best of all. We had a really great time. Four Days in my life that i`ll never forget again. Thank you for there days an all the experiences we got. I totally recommended you and the Hotspots Tour. Best regards, Viktoria

Maudi. Thank you Maudi for the great time.You have definitely been the best taxi driver we have ever had.If we want to do some further tours, we will inform you, not only because of the bungee jump.Best regardsMichael, Robin
2 day weekend safari tour. For a two day trip I was amazed at how much we were able to do and see. Isaac was an excellent guide whose knowledge and kindness truly enhanced the entire experience!
Wonderful Garden Route Tour!. Xenny is an incredible guide and I had no problems with the company. I totally recommended and would take the trip again.

Cape Peninsula Tour. amazing 1 day tour of Cape Peninsula - both our tour guide, Fayrouz and driver, Leon are a great duo and it made our tour even more fun. Both knew the area, culture and people so well.

Thank you Xenny, the tour was great!!!. Last weekend I did the 4 day tour Garden Route and J´bay with Hotspots2c. The tour was fantastic and our tour guide was the best I ever had. I would recommend the tour to anyone. Thanks for the funny weekend Xenny!

Great Holidays. Two weeks ago i traveled with Xenny and a group 8 young people 5 days. It was lovely. Xenny is full of energy and everytime taking care about everybody to be sure that everything is fine. We had a lot of possibilities in our trip (Garden Route) like being close with animals (for examples lions, elefants, ostrichs), Zip Lining, Bungee jumping and many many more. If you're interested to meet new people and learn more about southafrica book the trip. You will enjoy for sure.Thank You Xenny

Amazing 5 day adventure - thank you Xenny!. It took me nearly a year to write this review. I always swear by being sincere and honest in my reviews - this is the best tour company for the Cape area and Xenny is one in a million! I definitely recommend - both the company and venuring into this amazing land, and the price that hotspots2c is offering is one that most of us can afford. My friends spent £1000nds on the same things that we saw for much, much less.

5 day Garden Route trip. It was just awesome! Special thanks to Xenny, one of the best tour guides I ever had. Although I travelled alone, I had a lot of fun. It's amazing to visit so many picturesque places in only 5 days. In Knysna we should have spent more time :)

Garden Route in 4 days with teens. We had a very exiting and great tour with Xenny, the best guide ever. He took good care of us and told us many interesting stories along the trip. I would absolutely recommend him and Hotspots2c for everyone wanting to see the best of SA.

Garden Route in 5 days. This trip was a very good experience into the land of SA. We saw so many things in just 5 days. Our guide Xenny was a very nice person and he was there whenever needed. Make sure to sign up for him as your guide if you are taking a tour with hotspots! The only thing you should consider is the amount of time in the viecle. We drove a lot. Thats all. A very nice trip :)
Wonderful Trip. I just returned from the 2 day trip. My group was lucky enough to have Paul as our guide and thus a wonderful time.Would gladly both recommend to others and go again myself!!

This trip allowed you to see and experience a variety of activities and scenery!. The trip allowed me to experience a large portion of south Africa. I saw a lot of animals and wonderful scenery! Our guide, Paul, was VERY knowledgable and excited to share each of our experiences! I was the only one from the group who did the optional crocodile cage diving and while the others were waiting, Paul was on the boardwalk above taking pictures of me and the crocs! That was very nice of him! We were never rushed along the trip- he made sure we knew it was OUR trip that we paid for! Great trip and I would highly recommend it if you have the time and would like to see and experience South Africa in a unique way!

The 4 day Garden Route tour. It was a great experience, and you definetly need to go on the trip! I enjoyed every bit of it.
